name: Jewel Quest Mysteries: The Seventh Gate
name_original: Jewel Quest Mysteries: The Seventh Gate
description: The hit hidden object series is back, and it's better than ever! Venture through the hidden relics of Greece as you join Emma in search of her husband and daughter, who have fallen victim to a horrible struggle. They began their journey to uncover the mysteries of the famed jewel boards of ancient Greece.  Emma must find her missing family before the impending volcanic eruption that will put all of their lives in peril. Don't miss out on this exciting and dangerous adventure that is unlike any other!
